title: The prologue to the last new play, A duke and no duke spoken by Mr. Jevon.
author: Duffett, Thomas.
notes: Attributed by Wing to both Thomas Duffet (D2451) and Nahum Tate (T215). Attributed by NUC pre-1956 imprints to Thomas Duffet.
Item at reel 1160:5 identified as Wing T215 (number cancelled).
Includes "The epilogue, spoken by Mr. Haines."
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the British Library.
